ticket.title: Can't create rails3 app using installed gem
ticket.original-body:
Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7600] Copyright (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
C:\TOOLS\Console2\bin\release>rails test2 C:/Ruby19/lib/ruby/site_ruby/1.9.1/rubygems.rb:384:in `bin_path': can't find executable rails for rails-3.0.0.beta (Gem::Exception) from <internal:gem_prelude>:335:in `method_missing' from C:/Ruby19/bin/rails:19:in `<main>'
ticket.latest-body:
Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7600] Copyright (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
C:\TOOLS\Console2\bin\release>rails test2 C:/Ruby19/lib/ruby/site_ruby/1.9.1/rubygems.rb:384:in `bin_path': can't find executable rails for rails-3.0.0.beta (Gem::Exception) from <internal:gem_prelude>:335:in `method_missing' from C:/Ruby19/bin/rails:19:in `<main>'

Copyright (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

version.title: Can't create rails3 app using installed gem
Can't create rails3 app using installed gem

version.body:
This is a known bug for windows. A quick search for it in Lighthouse brings it:
https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/3861-script-replaced-by-scriptrails-not-working
version.body-html:
This is a known bug for windows. A quick search for it in Lighthouse brings it:

https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/3861-script-r...
